name: PufferfishMC
description: High performance Minecraft server with improved gameplay and mechanics.

installScript.script:
wget https://ci.pufferfish.host/job/Pufferfish-1.20/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/build/libs/pufferfish-paperclip-1.20.4-R0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar -O pufferfish-1.20.4.jar && echo "eula=true" > eula.txt && if [ ! -f server.properties ]; then echo "server-port=25565
query.port=25565
gamemode=survival
difficulty=easy
max-players=20
level-name=world
view-distance=10
spawn-protection=0
online-mode=true
motd=A Minecraft Server
" > server.properties; fi
